channel.title: Kill NPC and get Tellied?
channel.description:
Making a new mini game because my server is messed up and doesn't have gs-mini
Just looking for something so when i kill a NPC type it will telly me to a certain location
As Always all help and guess are appreciated :) ~Legit Gltich~

item.title: Kill NPC and get Tellied?
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Gltich Legit Gltich
item.description:
@Legit_Gltich wrote:

alright thanks alot man,
I’ll try it out now

Yeah it worked thanks dude your beastly!

Read full topic

item.title: Kill NPC and get Tellied?
item.dc:creator: @zoro35 zoro35
item.description:
@zoro35 wrote:

In NPCHandler.java search

int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;

Then you will see something like this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 84) //Black Demon
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage("Omg, You managed killing him, go for  wolf to advance");
ppl.teleportToX = 2647;
ppl.teleportToY = 9858;
}

Below it just use this format

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCIDHERE) //NAMEOFMONSTER (optional)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage("Message you want to send");
ppl.teleportToX = XXXX; //X coords to tele after kill
ppl.teleportToY = YYYY; //Y coords to tele after kill
}

That should work

Read full topic
